con:testCase.name: Create Active Customer with email only - Positive

con:request.name: Create Customer
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wrap="http://conductor/customer/vo/wrapper/" xmlns:vo="http://conductor/customer/vo/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <wrap:CreateCustomer><!--Optional:--> <wrap:customer> <!--Optional:--> <vo:email>soapui_${=import java.text.SimpleDateFormat ; new SimpleDateFormat("YY-MM-DD HH:MM").format(new Date())}@ie.fujitsu.com</vo:email> </wrap:customer> <!--Optional:--> <wrap:status>Active</wrap:status> </wrap:CreateCustomer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select * from customers where customer_code = '${Create Customer#Response#declare namespace ns3='http://conductor/customer/vo/wrapper/'; //ns3:CreateCustomerResponse[1]/ns3:customerID[1]}'

con:testCase.name: Create Interested Customer with email only - Positive

con:request.name: Create Customer
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wrap="http://conductor/customer/vo/wrapper/" xmlns:vo="http://conductor/customer/vo/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <wrap:CreateCustomer><!--Optional:--> <wrap:customer> <!--Optional:--> <vo:email>soapui_${=import java.text.SimpleDateFormat ; new SimpleDateFormat("YY-MM-DD HH:MM").format(new Date())}@ie.fujitsu.com</vo:email> </wrap:customer> <!--Optional:--> <wrap:status>Interested</wrap:status> </wrap:CreateCustomer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select * from customers where customer_code = '${Create Customer#Response#declare namespace ns3='http://conductor/customer/vo/wrapper/'; //ns3:CreateCustomerResponse[1]/ns3:customerID[1]}'
select cust.*, addr.* from customers cust, addresses addr where cust.customer_id = addr.customer_id and cust.status = 'a' and rownum = 1
select cust.*, addr.* from customers cust, addresses addr where cust.customer_id = addr.customer_id and cust.status = 'i' and rownum = 1
select sim from sims where mvno_id = 6 and status = 'r' and rownum = 1

con:request.name: CreateAccount - Active NP
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wrap="http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <wrap:CreateAccount> <!--Optional:--> <CustomerId>${#[Customer#Create Active Customer with email only - Positive#Create Customer]#Response#declare namespace wrap='http://conductor/customer/vo/wrapper/'; //wrap:CreateCustomerResponse[1]/wrap:customerID[1]}</CustomerId> <RatePlanId>NP</RatePlanId> <Sim>${Get Reserved SIM#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/SIM[1]}</Sim> <!--Optional:--> <AccountStatus>2</AccountStatus> </wrap:CreateAccount> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.content: ${#[Customer#Create Active Customer with email only - Positive#Create Customer]#Response#declare namespace ns3='http://conductor/customer/vo/wrapper/'; //ns3:CreateCustomerResponse[1]/ns3:customerID[1]}

con:config.con:query: select a.account_code, c.customer_code, rp.rate_plan_name, m.msisdn, s.imsi, s.sim, s.puk, s.puk2 from accounts a, customers c, rate_plans rp, msisdns m, sims s, account_msisdns am, account_sims asim where a.customer_id = c.customer_id and a.account_id = am.account_id and a.account_id = asim.account_id and am.msisdn_id = m.msisdn_id and asim.sim_id = s.sim_id and a.rate_plan_id = rp.rate_plan_id and a.account_code = '${CreateAccount - Active NP#Response#declare namespace ns12='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns12:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/AccountId[1]}'

select fps.provisioning_request_def_id, fps.status, npq.provisioning_command_id, npq.status from fps_provisioning_requests fps, network_provisioning_queue npq where fps.provisioning_request_def_id = (select provisioning_request_def_id from provisioning_request_defs where request_type = 'create_account') and fps.provisioning_request_id = npq.provisioning_request_id and fps.account_id = (select account_id from accounts where account_code = '${CreateAccount - Active NP#Response#declare namespace ns12='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns12:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/AccountId[1]}') order by npq.provisioning_command_id asc

select service_id, status from account_services where account_id = (select account_id from accounts where account_code = '${CreateAccount - Active NP#Response#declare namespace ns12='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //ns12:CreateAccountResponse[1]/AccountDetails[1]/AccountId[1]}') order by service_id asc

con:testStep.name: Get DefaultService and compare to AccountServices

con:config.con:query: select service_id, status from rate_plan_services where status = 'a' and rate_plan_id = (select rate_plan_id from rate_plans where rate_plan_name = '${CreateAccount - Active NP#Request#declare namespace wrap='http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/'; //wrap:CreateAccount[1]/RatePlanId[1]}') order by service_id asc

con:config.con:query: select a.account_code, c.customer_code, rp.rate_plan_name, m.msisdn, s.imsi, s.sim, s.puk, s.puk2 from accounts a, customers c, rate_plans rp, msisdns m, sims s, account_msisdns am, account_sims asim where a.customer_id = c.customer_id and a.account_id = am.account_id and a.account_id = asim.account_id and am.msisdn_id = m.msisdn_id and asim.sim_id = s.sim_id and a.rate_plan_id = rp.rate_plan_id and a.mvno_id = 6 and a.status = 1 and c.is_bulk = 'F' and rownum = 1 order by dbms_random.value

select a.account_code, c.customer_code, rp.rate_plan_name, m.msisdn, s.imsi, s.sim, s.puk, s.puk2 from accounts a, customers c, rate_plans rp, msisdns m, sims s, account_msisdns am, account_sims asim where a.customer_id = c.customer_id and a.account_id = am.account_id and a.account_id = asim.account_id and am.msisdn_id = m.msisdn_id and asim.sim_id = s.sim_id and a.rate_plan_id = rp.rate_plan_id and a.mvno_id = 6 and a.status = 3 and c.customer_code != 'CUST0005527302' and rownum = 1 order by dbms_random.value

con:assertion.name: Validate PUK2 with validation for 8 chars
Validate PUK with validation for 8 chars

con:testCase.name: AccountSearch - Deactive Account with neither SIM or MSISDN reused

con:config.con:query: select a.account_code, c.customer_code, rp.rate_plan_name, m.msisdn, s.imsi, s.sim, s.puk, s.puk2 from accounts a, customers c, rate_plans rp, msisdns m, sims s, account_msisdns am, account_sims asim where a.customer_id = c.customer_id and a.account_id = am.account_id and am.status = 'a' and not exists (select 'x' from account_msisdns where msisdn_id = am.msisdn_id and account_id != a.account_id) and a.account_id = asim.account_id and asim.status = 'a' and not exists (select 'x' from account_sims where sim_id = asim.sim_id and account_id != a.account_id) and am.msisdn_id = m.msisdn_id and asim.sim_id = s.sim_id and a.rate_plan_id = rp.rate_plan_id and a.mvno_id = 6 and a.status = 4 and c.is_bulk = 'T' and rownum < 2 order by dbms_random.value

con:assertion.name: Validate PUK2 with validation for 8 chars
Validate PUK with validation for 8 chars

con:testCase.name: AccountSearch - Account Deactivated by Lifecycle, SIM set to 'r'

con:config.con:query: select a.account_code, c.customer_code, rp.rate_plan_name, m.msisdn, s.imsi, s.sim, s.puk, s.puk2 from accounts a, customers c, rate_plans rp, msisdns m, sims s, account_msisdns am, account_sims asim where a.customer_id = c.customer_id and a.account_id = am.account_id and am.status = 'a' and a.account_id = asim.account_id and asim.status = 'd' and am.msisdn_id = m.msisdn_id and asim.sim_id = s.sim_id and a.rate_plan_id = rp.rate_plan_id and a.mvno_id = 6 and a.status = 4 and m.reason = 'GGLFY' and s.status = 'r' and rownum = 1 order by dbms_random.value

con:testCase.name: AccountSearch - Deactive Account with MSISDN reused

con:config.con:query: select a.account_code, c.customer_code, rp.rate_plan_name, m.msisdn, s.imsi, s.sim, s.puk, s.puk2 from accounts a, customers c, rate_plans rp, msisdns m, sims s, account_msisdns am, account_sims asim where a.customer_id = c.customer_id and a.account_id = am.account_id --and am.status = 'd' and exists (select 'x' from account_msisdns where msisdn_id = am.msisdn_id and account_id != a.account_id) and a.account_id = asim.account_id and asim.status = 'a' and am.msisdn_id = m.msisdn_id and asim.sim_id = s.sim_id and a.rate_plan_id = rp.rate_plan_id and m.status = 'a' and a.mvno_id = 6 and a.status = 4 and c.is_bulk = 'T' and rownum = 1 order by dbms_random.value

con:assertion.name: Validate PUK2 with validation for 8 chars
Validate PUK with validation for 8 chars

con:config.con:query: select a.account_code, c.customer_code, rp.rate_plan_name, m.msisdn, s.imsi, s.sim, s.puk, s.puk2 from accounts a, customers c, rate_plans rp, msisdns m, sims s, account_msisdns am, account_sims asim where a.customer_id = c.customer_id and a.account_id = am.account_id and am.status = 'a' and a.account_id = asim.account_id and asim.status = 'a' and am.msisdn_id = m.msisdn_id and asim.sim_id = s.sim_id and a.rate_plan_id = rp.rate_plan_id and m.msisdn = '${Find Deactive Account#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/MSISDN[1]}' and a.mvno_id = 6 and a.status = 2 and rownum = 1 order by dbms_random.value

con:testCase.name: AccountTakeover - Active account with pending request

con:testStep.name: Find Active Account with pending request

con:config.con:query: select a.account_code, c.customer_code, rp.rate_plan_name, m.msisdn, s.imsi, s.sim, s.puk, s.puk2 from accounts a, customers c, rate_plans rp, msisdns m, sims s, account_msisdns am, account_sims asim, fps_provisioning_requests fps where a.customer_id = c.customer_id and a.account_id = am.account_id and a.account_id = asim.account_id and am.msisdn_id = m.msisdn_id and asim.sim_id = s.sim_id and a.rate_plan_id = rp.rate_plan_id and a.account_id = fps.account_id and fps.status != '3' and a.mvno_id = 6 and a.status = 2 and c.customer_code != 'CUST0005527302' and rownum = 1 order by dbms_random.value

con:testStep.name: AccountTakeover - Active Account with pending requests

con:request.name: AccountTakeover - Active Account with pending requests
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wrap="http://conductor/account/vo/wrapper/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <wrap:AccountTakeover> <accountId>${Find Active Account with pending request#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/ACCOUNT_CODE[1]}</accountId> <customerId>${#[Account#AccountTakeover - Active account#CreateNewCustomer]#Response#declare namespace wrap='http://conductor/customer/vo/wrapper/'; //wrap:CreateCustomerResponse[1]/wrap:customerID[1]}</customerId> </wrap:AccountTakeover> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query:
SELECT --ACCOUNTS A.ACCOUNT_ID, A.ACCOUNT_CODE, A.STATUS AS ACCOUNT_STATUS, A.CUSTOMER_ID, A.RATE_PLAN_ID, --CUSTOMERS C.CUSTOMER_ID, C.CUSTOMER_CODE, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, C.EMAIL, C.STATUS AS CUSTOMER_STATUS, --ADDRESSES AD.STREET_NAME, AD.STREET_NUMBER, AD.POST_CODE, --ACCOUNT_MSISDNS AM.MSISDN_ID, AM.STATUS AS ACC_MSISDN_STATUS, AM.REASON AS ACC_MSISDN_REASON, AM.UPDATED_AT AS ACC_MSISDN_UPDATED_AT, AM.UPDATED_BY AS ACC_MSISDN_UPDATED_BY, AM.IS_CURRENT AS ACC_MSISDN_IS_CURRENT, --ACCOUNT_SIMS ASIM.SIM_ID, ASIM.STATUS AS ACC_SIM_STATUS, ASIM.REASON AS ACC_SIM_REASON, ASIM.UPDATED_AT AS ACC_SIM_UPDATED_AT, ASIM.UPDATED_BY AS ACC_SIM_UPDATED_BY, ASIM.IS_CURRENT AS ACC_SIM_IS_CURRENT, --MSISDNS M.MSISDN, M.STATUS AS MSISDN_STATUS, M.CREATED_AT AS MSISDN_CREATED_AT, --SIMS S.SIM, S.IMSI, S.STATUS AS SIM_STATUS, S.CREATED_AT AS SIM_CREATED_AT
FROM ACCOUNTS A, CUSTOMERS C, ADDRESSES AD, ACCOUNT_MSISDNS AM, ACCOUNT_SIMS ASIM, MSISDNS M, SIMS S, ACCOUNT_HISTORY AH, CUSTOMER_HISTORY CH WHERE not exists (select * from PAYMENT_ARRANGEMENTS where customer_id = C.CUSTOMER_CODE) and A.ACCOUNT_ID = AM.ACCOUNT_ID AND A.ACCOUNT_ID = ASIM.ACCOUNT_ID AND A.ACCOUNT_ID = AH.ACCOUNT_ID AND A.CUSTOMER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID AND A.CUSTOMER_ID = AD.CUSTOMER_ID --AND C.CUSTOMER_ID = CH.CUSTOMER_ID AND AM.MSISDN_ID = M.MSISDN_ID --AND ASIM.SIM_ID = S.SIM_ID AND C.STATUS = 'a' AND A.STATUS = '2' --AND AM.STATUS = 'a' --AND UPPER(M.STATUS) = UPPER('a') --AND lower(ASIM.STATUS) = 'a' --AND UPPER(S.STATUS) = UPPER('a') --to get migrated account --AND AH.CHANGED_AT < to_date ('01-DEC-14', 'DD-MON-YY') --and a.account_id in (select account_id from (select min(changed_at), account_id from account_history where changed_at < '01-DEC-14' group by account_id)) --to get migrated customer AND CH.CHANGED_AT < to_date ('01-DEC-15', 'DD-MON-YY') --and c.customer_id in (select customer_id from (select min(changed_at), customer_id from customer_history where changed_at < '01-DEC-14' group by customer_id)) --to get migrated msisdn --and m.created_at < to_date ('01-DEC-14', 'DD-MON-YY') --Trouble is with m.created_at!! --to get migrated sim --and s.created_at < to_date ('01-DEC-14', 'DD-MON-YY') and rownum = 1
select (order_id) + 1 from credit_card_audit where event_seq_id = (select max(event_seq_id) from credit_card_audit)
